songs.title: Always in My Head
songs.lyrics:
[Introduction]

I think of you
I haven't slept
I think I do
But I don't forget

My body moves
Goes where I will
But though I try
My heart stays still

It never moves
Just won't be led
So my mouth waters to be fed
And you're always in my head

You're always in my head
You're always in my head
You're always in my head

You're always in my head
Always in my
Always in my

This, I guess
Is to tell you you're chosen out
From the rest
